attacks.name: Cold Snap
attacks.effect: Your opponent can’t play any Trainer cards from their hand during their next turn. If 1 of your Pokémon used Cold Snap during your last turn, this attack can’t be used.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
